name: Dead Zed: Redemption
description:
Dead Zed Redemption is A Early Access (Voxel, Closed world, Multiplayer, Zombie Survival) Attempting to mimic the World At War Zombie survival Gamemode but throw my own little spin onto it with additional maps (Soon to come)

  • Team up with up to 4 of your friends Online!
  • Battle your way through Endless hordes of Zeds
  • Steal the random Item from the mystery box when it spawns! (Every 3 minutes)
  • Boast about your score and compete with others

More features soon to come
Note: This is a Early Access Version of DZR, All feedback is greatly appreciated and will be taken into consideration after viewing.

Engine: Unity 5.4
Built using
-UnitZ Asset Pack
-SimpleCity Assest Packs

(Music by Activision (Black Ops)
